org.locationtech.geowave.datastore.accumulo.operations

Class AccumuloOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.datastore.accumulo.operations.AccumuloOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreOperations, ServerSideOperations, MapReduceDataStoreOperations

    public class AccumuloOperations
extends Object
implements MapReduceDataStoreOperations, ServerSideOperations
    This class holds all parameters necessary for establishing Accumulo connections and provides basic factory methods for creating a batch scanner and a batch writer

      void removeServerOp(String index, String serverOpName, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> scopes)
      remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes
      void setCacheTimeoutMillis(long cacheTimeoutMillis)

      update this server operation, the current scopes are passed in because accumulo requires iteratorscope as a parameter to remove the iterator.

    • Field Detail

      • connector

        protected org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector connector

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccumuloOperations

        public AccumuloOperations(String zookeeperUrl,
                          String instanceName,
                          String userName,
                          String password,
                          String tableNamespace,
                          AccumuloOptions options)
                   throws org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloException,
                          org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloSecurityException
        This is will create an Accumulo connector based on passed in connection information and credentials for convenience convenience. It will also use reasonable defaults for unspecified parameters.
        Parameters:
        zookeeperUrl - The comma-delimited URLs for all zookeeper servers, this will be directly used to instantiate a ZookeeperInstance
        instanceName - The zookeeper instance name, this will be directly used to instantiate a ZookeeperInstance
        userName - The username for an account to establish an Accumulo connector
        password - The password for the account to establish an Accumulo connector
        tableNamespace - An optional string that is prefixed to any of the table names
        Throws:
        org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloException - Thrown if a generic exception occurs when establishing a connector
        org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloSecurityException - the credentials passed in are invalid

      • AccumuloOperations

        public AccumuloOperations(org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector connector,
                          AccumuloOptions options)
        This constructor uses reasonable defaults and only requires an Accumulo connector
        Parameters:
        connector - The connector to use for all operations

      • AccumuloOperations

        public AccumuloOperations(org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector connector,
                          String tableNamespace,
                          AccumuloOptions options)
        This constructor uses reasonable defaults and requires an Accumulo connector and table namespace
        Parameters:
        connector - The connector to use for all operations
        password - An optional string that is prefixed to any of the table names
        tableNamespace - An optional string that is prefixed to any of the table names

      • AccumuloOperations

        public AccumuloOperations(int numThreads,
                          long timeoutMillis,
                          long byteBufferSize,
                          String authorization,
                          String tableNamespace,
                          org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector connector,
                          AccumuloOptions options)
        This is the full constructor for the operation factory and should be used if any of the defaults are insufficient.
        Parameters:
        numThreads - The number of threads to use for a batch scanner and batch writer
        timeoutMillis - The time out in milliseconds to use for a batch writer
        byteBufferSize - The buffer size in bytes to use for a batch writer
        authorization - The authorization to use for a batch scanner
        tableNamespace - An optional string that is prefixed to any of the table names
        connector - The connector to use for all operations

      • removeServerOp

        public void removeServerOp(String index,
                           String serverOpName,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> scopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes
        Specified by:
        removeServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        serverOpName - the operation name
        scopes - the existing scopes

      • addServerOp

        public void addServerOp(String index,
                        int priority,
                        String name,
                        String operationClass,
                        Map<String,String> properties,
                        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> configuredScopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        add this server operation
        Specified by:
        addServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        configuredScopes - the scopes

      • updateServerOp

        public void updateServerOp(String index,
                           int priority,
                           String name,
                           String operationClass,
                           Map<String,String> properties,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> currentScopes,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> newScopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        update this server operation, the current scopes are passed in because accumulo requires iteratorscope as a parameter to remove the iterator. This will update the server op to the new scope.
        Specified by:
        updateServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        currentScopes - the existing scopes
        newScopes - the new configured scopes
